title: Calories in a Honeycrisp Apple
meta_description: Discover calories in honeycrisp apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for one medium fruit.
assumptions: Medium Honeycrisp apple (~182 g with skin and core removed for edible portion), raw, unpeeled.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, growing conditions, and variety specifics. Check produce labels or apps for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One medium Honeycrisp apple provides ~95 kcal, mostly from natural sugars and fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Honeycrisp apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for a medium-sized one.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Honeycrisp apple?
faqs.a: Roughly 25 g total carbs, including 4.4 g fiber and 19 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a Honeycrisp apple low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.3 g fat per medium apple, with minimal saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much fiber in Honeycrisp apple calories query?
faqs.a: One medium apple has 4.4 g dietary fiber, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Does apple size affect calories in Honeycrisp?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”small apples ~70 kcal, large ~115 kcal; medium is standard at 95 kcal.
